name: workflow-tools
description: Productivity and development workflow toolkit with task orchestration, writing quality standards, prompt development, intent refinement, context migration, code auditing, Azure DevOps operations, skill creation, Swift/iOS development skills, and macOS Shortcuts automation.

plugins.name: workflow-tools
plugins.description: Eighteen skills for productivity workflows and Swift/iOS development. Includes iter, writing, prompt-dev, sharpen, chat-migration, code-audit, azure-devops, skill-creator, plus swift-dev hub with 9 specialist skills (SwiftUI, SwiftData, concurrency, accessibility, Swift Testing, Foundation Models). Bundled macOS Shortcuts MCP server.
